fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Num = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs])
VAR Den = CALCULATE(
    SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs]),
    ALL('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)')
)
RETURN DIVIDE(Num, Den)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau TOTAL() table calculation with a DAX total using CALCULATE(..., ALL(table)). Transformed column references to the 'TableName'[Column] format. Used SUM(...) around the referenced field to provide the aggregated numerator and CALCULATE(..., ALL(...)) for the denominator, and DIVIDE(...) for safe division.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses TOTAL(), a table calculation (aggregation across the partition). Per the conversion rules, expressions containing table calculations must be implemented as measures.
